document.full_text: the phillies ' known for their resilience and resourcefulness ' started off with a late-inning comeback as they pinned a three-run barrage on the astros to win friday.
document.title: phillies 5, astros 4: finish by the phillies looks familiar
lines_and_colors: the phillies ' known for their resilience and resourcefulness ' started off with a late-inning comeback as they pinned a three-run barrage on the astros to win friday.
